trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Get-WmiObject
trans-unit.target: Get-WmiObject

trans-unit.source: Get-WmiObject
trans-unit.target: Get-WmiObject

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Gets instances of Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) classes or information about the available classes.
trans-unit.target: 取得 Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) 類別的執行個體，或可用類別的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: query (Default)
trans-unit.target: 查詢 （預設值）

trans-unit.source: list
trans-unit.target: 清單

trans-unit.source: WQLQuery
trans-unit.target: WQLQuery

trans-unit.source: path
trans-unit.target: 路徑

trans-unit.source: class
trans-unit.target: class

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Starting in Windows PowerShell 3.0, this cmdlet has been superseded by Get-CimInstancehttp://technet.microsoft.com/library/jj590758(v=wps.630).aspx.
trans-unit.target: 從 Windows PowerShell 3.0 開始，這個指令程式已被取代 Get CimInstancehttp://technet.microsoft.com/library/jj590758(v=wps.630).aspx.

trans-unit.source: The **Get-WmiObject** cmdlet gets instances of WMI classes or information about the available WMI classes.
trans-unit.target: **Get-wmiobject** cmdlet 會取得 WMI 類別或可用的 WMI 類別的相關資訊的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: To specify a remote computer, use the **ComputerName** parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定遠端電腦，請使用 **ComputerName** 參數。

trans-unit.source: If the **List** parameter is specified, the cmdlet gets information about the WMI classes that are available in a specified namespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果 **清單** 參數未指定，此 cmdlet 會取得指定之命名空間中可用的 WMI 類別的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: If the **Query** parameter is specified, the cmdlet runs a WMI query language (WQL) statement.
trans-unit.target: 如果 **查詢** 參數，此指令程式會執行 WMI 查詢語言 (WQL) 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: The **Get-WmiObject** cmdlet does not use Windows PowerShell remoting to perform remote operations.
trans-unit.target: **Get-wmiobject** 指令程式不會使用 Windows PowerShell 遠端功能來執行遠端作業。

trans-unit.source: You can use the **ComputerName** parameter of the **Get-WmiObject** cmdlet even if your computer does not meet the requirements for Windows PowerShell remoting or is not configured for remoting in Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 **ComputerName** 參數 **Get-wmiobject** 即使您的電腦不符合 Windows PowerShell 遠端功能需求，或未設定為 Windows PowerShell 遠端功能的 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Beginning in Windows PowerShell 3.0, the **__Server** property of the object that **Get-WmiObject** returns has a **PSComputerName** alias.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中，從 **__Server** 物件的屬性， **Get-wmiobject** 傳回具有 **PSComputerName** 別名。

trans-unit.source: This makes it easier to include the source computer name in output and reports.
trans-unit.target: 這樣比較容易在輸出和報告中包含來源電腦名稱。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: This command get the processes on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會取得本機電腦上的處理程序。

trans-unit.source: This command gets the services on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會取得遠端電腦上的服務。

trans-unit.source: It uses the ComputerName parameter to specify the Internet Protocol (IP) address, 127.0.0.1.
trans-unit.target: 它使用 ComputerName 參數來指定網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 位址 (127.0.0.1)。

trans-unit.source: By default, the current account must be a member of the Administrators group on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，目前的帳戶必須是遠端電腦上 Administrators 群組的成員。

trans-unit.source: This command gets the WMI classes in the root or default namespace of the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會取得根目錄中的 WMI 類別，或本機電腦預設的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: This command gets the WinRM service on the computers that are specified by the value of the **ComputerName** parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會取得 WinRM 服務的值所指定的電腦上 **ComputerName** 參數。

trans-unit.source: A pipeline operator (|) sends the output to the Format-List cmdlet, which adds the **PSComputerName** property to the default output.
trans-unit.target: 管線運算子 (|) 將輸出傳送至 Format-list 指令程式，以新增 **PSComputerName** 預設輸出的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This makes it easy to see the computer on which the service resides.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您輕鬆查看服務所在的電腦。

trans-unit.source: **PSComputerName** is an alias of the **__Server** property of the objects that **Get-WmiObject** returns.
trans-unit.target: **PSComputerName** 的別名， **__Server** 物件的屬性， **Get-wmiobject** 傳回。

trans-unit.source: This alias is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此別名是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: This command stops the WinRM service on the Server01 remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會停止 Server01 遠端電腦上的 WinRM 服務。

trans-unit.source: The command uses a **Get-WmiObject** command to get the WinRM service on Server01.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 **Get-wmiobject** 命令取得 Server01 上的 WinRM 服務。

trans-unit.source: Then, it invokes the **StopService** method of the Win32_Service WMI class on the object that the **Get-WmiObject** command returns.
trans-unit.target: 然後，它會叫用 **StopService** Win32_Service WMI 類別物件上的方法， **Get-wmiobject** 命令會傳回。

trans-unit.source: This command is an alternative to using the Stop-Service cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 這個命令是使用 Stop-service cmdlet 的替代方法。

trans-unit.source: This command gets the BIOS on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會取得本機電腦上的 BIOS。

trans-unit.source: The command uses a value of all (*) for the Property parameter of the Format-List cmdlet to display all properties of the returned object in a list.
trans-unit.target: 命令使用 Format-list cmdlet 的 Property 參數的值為所有 （*），顯示傳回物件的所有屬性清單中。

trans-unit.source: By default, only a subset (defined in the Types.ps1xml configuration file) are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，只會顯示子集 (在 Types.ps1xml 設定檔中定義)。

trans-unit.source: This command uses the **Credential** parameter of the **Get-WmiObject** cmdlet to get the services on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 **認證** 參數 **Get-wmiobject** cmdlet 來取得遠端電腦上的服務。

trans-unit.source: The value of the **Credential** parameter is a user account name.
trans-unit.target: 值 **認證** 參數是使用者帳戶名稱。

trans-unit.source: The user is prompted for a password.
trans-unit.target: 使用者會被提示輸入密碼。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -Amended
trans-unit.target: -修改

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the objects that are returned from WMI should contain amended information.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定一個值，該值會指示從 WMI 傳回的物件是否該包含修改過的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Typically, amended information is localizable information, such as object and property descriptions, that is attached to the WMI object.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，修改的資訊是可當地語系化的資訊，例如附加至 WMI 物件的物件和屬性描述。

trans-unit.source: -AsJob
trans-unit.target: -AsJob

trans-unit.source: Runs the command as a background job.
trans-unit.target: 以背景工作方式執行命令。

trans-unit.source: Use this parameter to run commands that take a long time to finish.
trans-unit.target: 使用此參數執行需要很長時間才能完成的命令。

trans-unit.source: When you use the **AsJob** parameter, the command returns an object that represents the background job and then displays the command prompt.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 **AsJob** 參數，命令會傳回代表背景工作，然後顯示 [命令提示字元的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can continue to work in the session while the job finishes.
trans-unit.target: 工作完成後，您可以繼續在工作階段中工作。

trans-unit.source: If **Get-WmiObject** is used on a remote computer, the job is created on the local computer, and the results from remote computers are automatically returned to the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 如果 **Get-wmiobject** 用在遠端電腦上的本機電腦上，建立工作，而來自遠端電腦的結果會自動傳回到本機電腦。

trans-unit.source: To manage the job, use the cmdlets that contain the Job cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 若要管理工作，請使用包含 Job Cmdlet 的 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: To get the job results, use the Receive-Job cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得工作結果，請使用 Receive-Job Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Note: To use this parameter with remote computers, the local and remote computers must be configured for remoting.
trans-unit.target: 附註︰ 若要使用此參數與遠端電腦，在本機和遠端電腦必須設定的遠端執行功能。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, you must start Windows PowerShell by using the "Run as administrator" option in Windows Vista and later versions of Windows.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您必須使用 Windows Vista 和更新版之 Windows 中的 [以系統管理員身分執行] 選項來啟動 Windows PowerShell。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Remote_Requirements.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Remote_Requirements。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Windows PowerShell background jobs, see about_Jobs and about_Remote_Jobs.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 Windows PowerShell 背景工作的詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Jobs 和 about_Remote_Jobs。

trans-unit.source: -Authentication
trans-unit.target: -驗證

trans-unit.source: Specifies the authentication level to be used with the WMI connection.
trans-unit.target: 指定要與 WMI 連線搭配使用的驗證等級。

trans-unit.source: Valid values are:
trans-unit.target: 有效值為：

trans-unit.source: -1: Unchanged
trans-unit.target: -1︰ 不變

trans-unit.source: 0: Default
trans-unit.target: 0︰ 預設

trans-unit.source: 1: None (No authentication in performed.)
trans-unit.target: 1︰ 無 （不執行驗證。）

trans-unit.source: 2: Connect (Authentication is performed only when the client establishes a relationship with the application.)
trans-unit.target: 2︰ 連接 （在用戶端建立與應用程式的關聯性時，才會執行驗證）。

trans-unit.source: 3: Call (Authentication is performed only at the beginning of each call when the application receives the request.)
trans-unit.target: 3︰ 呼叫 （執行驗證只能在每個呼叫開始時，應用程式接收要求。）

trans-unit.source: 4: Packet (Authentication is performed on all the data that is received from the client.)
trans-unit.target: 4︰ 封包 （驗證從用戶端接收到的所有資料上執行）。

trans-unit.source: 5: PacketIntegrity (All the data that is transferred between the client and the application is authenticated and verified.)
trans-unit.target: 5: PacketIntegrity （全部驗證並確認用戶端與應用程式之間傳輸資料。）

trans-unit.source: 6: PacketPrivacy (The properties of the other authentication levels are used, and all the data is encrypted.)
trans-unit.target: 6: PacketPrivacy （使用層級，其他驗證的屬性和所有資料已加密）。

trans-unit.source: -Authority
trans-unit.target: 授權

trans-unit.source: Specifies the authority to use to authenticate the WMI connection.
trans-unit.target: 指定用來驗證 WMI 連線的授權單位。

trans-unit.source: You can specify standard NTLM or Kerberos authentication.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定標準 NTLM 或 Kerberos 驗證。

trans-unit.source: To use NTLM, set the authority setting to ntlmdomain:\<DomainName\>, where \<DomainName\> identifies a valid NTLM domain name.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用 NTLM，將授權單位設定為 ntlmdomain:\<DomainName\>, ，其中 \<DomainName\> 識別有效的 NTLM 網域名稱。

trans-unit.source: To use Kerberos, specify kerberos:\<DomainName\>\\\<ServerName\>".
trans-unit.target: 若要使用 Kerberos，請指定 kerberos:\<DomainName\>\\\<ServerName\>」。

trans-unit.source: You cannot include the authority setting when you connect to the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 當您連線到本機電腦時，不能包含授權單位設定。

trans-unit.source: -Class
trans-unit.target: 類別

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of a WMI class.
trans-unit.target: 指定 WMI 類別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: When this parameter is used, the cmdlet retrieves instances of the WMI class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此參數時，Cmdlet 會抓取 WMI 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: -ComputerName
trans-unit.target: -ComputerName

trans-unit.source: Specifies the target computer for the management operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定管理操作的目標電腦。

trans-unit.source: Enter a fully qualified domain name, a NetBIOS name, or an IP address.
trans-unit.target: 輸入完整網域名稱、NetBIOS 名稱或 IP 位址。

trans-unit.source: When the remote computer is in a different domain than the local computer, the fully qualified domain name is required.
trans-unit.target: 當遠端電腦與本機電腦位於不同網域，則必須使用完整網域名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 預設是本機電腦。

trans-unit.source: To specify the local computer, such as in a list of computer names, use "localhost", the local computer name, or a dot (.).
trans-unit.target: 若要指定本機電腦 (例如在一份電腦名稱清單中)，請使用 "localhost"、本機電腦名稱或句點 (.)。

trans-unit.source: This parameter does not rely on Windows PowerShell remoting, which uses WS-Management.
trans-unit.target: 此參數不必依賴使用 WS-Management 的 Windows PowerShell 遠端功能。

trans-unit.source: You can use the **ComputerName** parameter of **Get-WmiObject** even if your computer is not configured to run WS-Management remote commands.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 **ComputerName** 參數 **Get-wmiobject** 即使您的電腦未設定為執行 Ws-management 遠端命令。

trans-unit.source: -Credential
trans-unit.target: -Credential

trans-unit.source: Specifies a user account that has permission to perform this action.
trans-unit.target: 指定具有執行此動作權限的使用者帳戶。

trans-unit.source: The default is the current user.
trans-unit.target: 預設為目前使用者。

trans-unit.source: Type a user name, such as "User01", "Domain01\User01", or User@Contoso.com.
trans-unit.target: 輸入使用者名稱，例如 "User01"、"Domain01\User01" 或 User@Contoso.com。

trans-unit.source: Or, enter a **PSCredential** object, such as an object that is returned by the Get-Credential cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 或者，輸入 **PSCredential** 物件，例如 Get-credential cmdlet 所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: When you type a user name, you are prompted for a password.
trans-unit.target: 當您輸入使用者名稱時，會提示您輸入密碼。

trans-unit.source: -DirectRead
trans-unit.target: -DirectRead

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether direct access to the WMI provider is requested for the specified class without any regard to its base class or to its derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否不論其基底類別或衍生類別，都針對指定類別要求直接存取 WMI 提供者。

trans-unit.source: -EnableAllPrivileges
trans-unit.target: -EnableAllPrivileges

trans-unit.source: Enables all the privileges of the current user before the command makes the WMI call.
trans-unit.target: 在命令進行 WMI 呼叫之前，先啟用目前使用者的所有權限。

trans-unit.source: -Filter
trans-unit.target: 篩選器

trans-unit.source: Specifies a **Where** clause to use as a filter.
trans-unit.target: 指定 **其中** 子句，以做為篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: Uses the syntax of the WMI Query Language (WQL).
trans-unit.target: 使用 WMI 查詢語言 (WQL) 的語法。

trans-unit.source: Important: Do not include the **Where** keyword in the value of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 重要事項︰ 不包含 **其中** 參數的值中的關鍵字。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following commands return only the logical disks that have a **DeviceID** of 'c:' and services that have the name 'WinRM' without using the **Where** keyword.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列命令會傳回只邏輯磁碟具有 **DeviceID** 'c:' 和服務，而不需使用具有名稱 'WinRM' **其中** 關鍵字。

trans-unit.source: -Impersonation
trans-unit.target: 模擬

trans-unit.source: Specifies the impersonation level to use.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的模擬等級。

trans-unit.source: Valid values are:
trans-unit.target: 有效值為：

trans-unit.source: 0: Default.
trans-unit.target: 0︰ 預設值。

trans-unit.source: Reads the local registry for the default impersonation level , which is usually set to "3: Impersonate".
trans-unit.target: 讀取本機登錄的預設模擬等級，通常會設定為"3︰ 模擬 」。

trans-unit.source: 1: Anonymous.
trans-unit.target: 1︰ 匿名。

trans-unit.source: Hides the credentials of the caller.
trans-unit.target: 隱藏呼叫端的認證。

trans-unit.source: 2: Identify.
trans-unit.target: 2︰ 識別。

trans-unit.source: Allows objects to query the credentials of the caller.
trans-unit.target: 允許物件查詢呼叫端的認證。

trans-unit.source: 3: Impersonate.
trans-unit.target: 3︰ 模擬。

trans-unit.source: Allows objects to use the credentials of the caller.
trans-unit.target: 允許物件使用呼叫端的認證。

trans-unit.source: 4: Delegate.
trans-unit.target: 4︰ 委派。

trans-unit.source: Allows objects to permit other objects to use the credentials of the caller.
trans-unit.target: 允許物件許可其他物件使用呼叫端的認證。

trans-unit.source: -List
trans-unit.target: 清單

trans-unit.source: Gets the names of the WMI classes in the WMI repository namespace that is specified by the **Namespace** parameter.
trans-unit.target: 取得所指定的 WMI 存放庫命名空間中的 WMI 類別名稱 **命名空間** 參數。

trans-unit.source: If you specify the **List** parameter, but not the **Namespace** parameter, **Get-WmiObject** uses the Root\Cimv2 namespace by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定 **清單** 參數，但不是 **命名空間** 參數， **Get-wmiobject** 預設會使用 Root\Cimv2 命名空間。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not use the **Default Namespace** registry entry in the HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\WBEM\Scripting registry key to determine the default namespace.
trans-unit.target: 這個指令程式不會使用 **預設命名空間** HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\WBEM\Scripting 登錄機碼，以判斷預設命名空間中的登錄項目。

trans-unit.source: -Locale
trans-unit.target: -地區設定

trans-unit.source: Specifies the preferred locale for WMI objects.
trans-unit.target: 指定 WMI 物件的慣用地區設定。

trans-unit.source: Enter a value in MS_\<LCID\> format.
trans-unit.target: 輸入值 ms_\<LCID\> 格式。

trans-unit.source: -Namespace
trans-unit.target: 命名空間

trans-unit.source: When used with the **Class** parameter, the **Namespace** parameter specifies the WMI repository namespace where the specified WMI class is located.
trans-unit.target: 當搭配 **類別** 參數， **命名空間** 參數會指定指定的 WMI 類別所在的 WMI 存放庫命名空間。

trans-unit.source: When used with the **List** parameter, it specifies the namespace from which to gather WMI class information.
trans-unit.target: 當搭配 **清單** 參數，它會指定要從中收集 WMI 類別資訊的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: -Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified WMI class properties.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定的 WMI 類別屬性。

trans-unit.source: Enter the property names.
trans-unit.target: 輸入屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: -Query
trans-unit.target: 查詢

trans-unit.source: Runs the specified WMI Query Language (WQL) statement.
trans-unit.target: 執行指定的 WMI 查詢語言 (WQL) 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: This parameter does not support event queries.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數不支援事件查詢。

trans-unit.source: -Recurse
trans-unit.target: -Recurse

trans-unit.source: Searches the current namespace and all other namespaces for the class name that is specified by the **Class** parameter.
trans-unit.target: 會搜尋目前的命名空間和類別名稱所指定的所有命名空間 **類別** 參數。

trans-unit.source: -ThrottleLimit
trans-unit.target: -ThrottleLimit

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of WMI operations that can be executed simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: 指定 WMI 作業能同時執行的數目上限。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when the **AsJob** parameter is used in the command.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數是時才有效 **AsJob** 命令中使用參數。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: You cannot pipe input to **Get-WmiObject**.
trans-unit.target: 您無法透過管道傳送輸入 **Get-wmiobject**。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: PSObject or System.Management.Automation.RemotingJob
trans-unit.target: PSObject 或 System.Management.Automation.RemotingJob

trans-unit.source: When you use the **AsJob** parameter, the cmdlet returns a job object.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 **AsJob** 參數，cmdlet 會傳回工作物件。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the object that **Get-WmiObject** returns depends on the value of the **Class** parameter.
trans-unit.target: 否則，該物件的 **Get-wmiobject** 傳回的值取決於 **類別** 參數。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: To access WMI information on a remote computer, the cmdlet must run under an account that is a member of the local administrators group on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 若要在遠端電腦存取 WMI 資訊，執行 Cmdlet 的帳戶必須是遠端電腦上本機 Administrators 群組的成員。

trans-unit.source: Or, the default access control on the WMI namespace of the remote repository can be changed to give access rights to other accounts.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以變更遠端存放庫的 WMI 命名空間上的預設存取控制，來授與其他帳戶存取權限。

trans-unit.source: Only some of the properties of each WMI class are displayed by default.
trans-unit.target: 預設只會顯示 WMI 類別的某些屬性。

trans-unit.source: The set of properties that is displayed for each WMI class is specified in the Types.ps1xml configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 每個 WMI 類別會顯示的屬性集指定於 Types.ps1xml 設定檔中。

trans-unit.source: To get all properties of a WMI object, use the Get-Member or Format-List cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得 WMI 物件的所有屬性，請使用 Get-member 或 Format-list cmdlet。

trans-unit.target: 相關的連結
